Package de.oth.blocklib.world.chunks

Class ChunkLoadAndSaver

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.world.chunks.ChunkLoadAndSaver
public class ChunkLoadAndSaver
extends java.lang.Object
This class uses the FileInputStream and the FileOutputStream to load and Save Chunks. The Chunk with the ChunkID (x,y,z) is saved in the file "SavedChunks/x/y/z.save"
Author:
Tobias Mueller

    • ChunkLoadAndSaver

      public ChunkLoadAndSaver()

  • Method Details

    • saveChunk

      public void saveChunk​(Chunk c)
      saves the Chunk c in "/SavedChunks/x/y/z.save" by serializing its StoneArray
      Parameters:
      c - Chunk to be saved

    • loadChunk

      public Chunk loadChunk​(ChunkIDObject cID)
      loads the Chunk of the CIDObject, which should be in "/SavedChunks/x/y/z.save"
      Parameters:
      cID - ChunkIDObeject of the Chunk which should be loaded
      Returns:
      returns the Chunk if it exists, else null

    • deleteSavedChunks

      public void deleteSavedChunks()
      can be called to delete all currently saved Chunks.

    • isChunkSaved

      public boolean isChunkSaved​(ChunkIDObject cID)
      returns true if there is a saved chunk existing for the ChunkIDObject
      Parameters:
      cID - ChunkIDObject of the Chunk
      Returns:
      true if a save exists, else false

    • saveBlocks

      private void saveBlocks​(Chunk c) throws java.io.IOException
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

      private void loadBlocks​(ChunkIDObject cID, Chunk c) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
